org.gradle.plugin.repository

Interface PluginRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GradlePluginPortal, IvyPluginRepository, MavenPluginRepository

    @Incubating
public interface PluginRepository
    Represents a repository from which Gradle plugins can be resolved.

    This type of repository will only be consulted when resolving plugins applied using the plugins {} syntax.
